lines.text: Polly! I am not so sure you haven't said something useful and important.
Everything I say is useful and important. Think it over while I look after the children.
So you have become one of the world's workers, Peter.
Yes, I'm pulling down four solid quid a week. Amazing sensation. Every time I get my pay packet, I glow with honest pride.
Sulking. He cannot understand why his namesake is in here going on about detecting, when his nephew is so much more interesting.
I frequently wonder the same thing.
